mapper.select: SELECT FILE_ID , FILE_NM , FILE_CONTENT , FILE_FULL_NM , CRT_ID , TO_CHAR(CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CRT_DT , CHG_ID , TO_CHAR(CHG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CHG_DT FROM DRAWING ORDER BY FILE_ID ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DRAWING ( FILE_ID , FILE_NM , FILE_CONTENT , FILE_FULL_NM , CRT_ID , CRT_DT , CHG_ID , CHG_DT ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(FILE_ID) + 1, 1) AS FILE_ID FROM DRAWING) , #{fileNm} , #{fileContent} , #{fileFullNm} , 'user1' , SYSDATE , 'user1' , SYSDATE )
